subject: Re: [junit] Best Practice for Tests ?
msgSnippet: ... David, Can you share your presentation slides and/or some material of your BOF session? Johannes
messageBody:
> In our team we widely use Robot for GUI automation. We do, though,
> have different requirements than most since we are testing the JDK as
> it is being developed, rather than testing an application built using
> the shipping JDK. I gave a brief talk last week at a JavaOne BOF
> about what we're doing for GUI test automation.

David,
Can you share your presentation slides and/or some material of your BOF
session?

Johannes
